response_parsed.title: Unit Testing WebAssembly (WASM) Targets with FastAPI using Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer outlines the steps to set up and run unit tests for FastAPI applications that target WebAssembly using Python 3.12+. We will discuss key components, code examples, version notes, and potential caveats.
key_points: Create unit tests for the WASM module

code_examples.code: pip install fastapi[all] uvicorn pytest pytest-runner websockets

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this setup.
FastAPI version 0.74.0 or later is recommended.
WebAssembly support is available in FastAPI since version 0.72.0.
caveats: The WebAssembly support in FastAPI is still experimental and may encounter bugs or limitations.
You may need to adjust your test cases to account for the differences between running on Python vs WASM.
Ensure you have a compatible WebAssembly target and system configuration.
